fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP 1104, 11/F., TIMES SQUARE, 1 MATHESON STREET, CAUSEWAY BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣勿地臣街1號時代廣場11樓1104室

geocode_en.formatted_address: 1104, 1 Matheson St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 1104, 1 Matheson St, Causeway Bay, 香港

result.adr_address: 1104, 1 Matheson St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 1104, 1 Matheson St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Mad for Garlic

reviews.text: Spacious well decorated restaurant.  Got there just after 2pm after the lunch rush hour.  Only about 4 tables occupied.  About 5 serving staff chatting and laughing in little groups, waved a few times, got totally ignored.  Had to get up and wave, gave the young lady a mild telling off, service get a lot more attentive there after.  Set lunch was tasty and good value for the location.

Went here for a work lunch and was comforted by the fact we’d all come out smelling like garlic together. I had a lunch special of garlic and mushroom pasta. A full garlic sat on top of the pasta which was odd. Very small and not particularly yum. If I went back I’d order differently. Nice decor and vibe however

Maybe I tried the wrong menu. The place is famous in Korea but not sure about here. I had the Mediterranean herb pasta. The pasta was difficult to taste under the so-called herbs. I had hoped the pasta would taste much much more of garlic. No luck for me.

I've been frequenting Mad for Garlic in Seoul since 2009. It's amazing how they managed to keep the original tastes of signature garlicky dishes all these years. But here, they seem to be doing something wrong..for example the garlicholic rice doesn't have cooked garlic all over (in addition to the fried ones). if you are expecting the experience you had in Korea here, you will be sorely disappointed.

Being true to my none existing Romanian roots I saw a place that is garlic friendly and I simply had to check it myself... Truth be told, this is a very nicely done concept.

While the garlic was pushed a bit too hard on some of the dishes, most of them were very nicely balanced and covered in a blanket of aromatic garlic flavors.

Would not recommend for romantic dates or business dinners for the obvious garlicky reasons.
